name: Zombie Hunter D-Day
description:
D-day is the latest zombie shooting game. It's a story of survival, 28 days after the apocalypse.
You need to make good use of various weapons to clear each stage of nemesis!
Defeat real zombies with powerful weapons to survive the kingdom of Zombie Land!

Features
- Graphic: Realistic 3D graphics and cool animations
- Limitless Stages: Various types of zombies and giant boss zombie appear in each stage, after stage, after stage.
- Weapon Collection: Dozens of classic guns are waiting for you to unlock, merge and upgrade.
- Internet: This is an offline game that does not require Internet or WiFi.
- Device: Perfect optimization even for slower devices.
- Languages: EN/CN/FR/PT/ES/DE/IDIT/RU/TH/TR/VN/KR are supported.

Just now! Download "D-day" for free! Kill the undead and win the worldwar of zombies.
